Hi all,

I am currently working on my first plugin for KSP, and I was wondering if there was any way to make an in-game window resizable? I currently have a window that can be dragged around, with buttons and sliders. I would like it to be so that when the player clicks the corner, they can resize the window. Any and all help is appreciated!

Thanks in advance!
check out the 000 toolbar source as it has resizable windows
Do you know where in the source I would find the resize code?
